content: I'm looking for example implementations of Endpoint having extended values for payloadType. I have this Australian IG: http://hl7.org.au/fhir/pd/pd2/StructureDefinition-au-pd-sm-endpoint.html ... which offers me a value set with several message types (http://hl7.org.au/fhir/pd/pd2/ValueSet-endpoint-payload-type.html). For my internal use, I want to extend that idea to include a larger set of payloadTypes and I'm looking for examples to see if I can re-use / steal a pattern for defining the URIs in my extended value set. (and in case it matters, the use case is that I'm sending messages among a large number of EMR systems who have implemented the various message types in 'creative' and individual ways, so I need a much finer-grained list than simply message type in order to know what a given system can receive). Thanks for any pointers...
given that these codes have been defined by HL7 Australia or the Agency, it would appear to be better to ask this question on the #australia channel
